backend/main.mo: Main canister logic handling user profiles, access control, and contact form submissions including new phone fields and admin-only junk submission retrieval.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old contact submissions to the new format by adding empty phone fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping new phone field UI, data lists, submission logic, and smoke tests to their corresponding frontend files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of autogenerated short summaries for all frontend source files and their roles.
frontend/.env.production.example: Example production env file showing how to set the public reCAPTCHA site key.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind setup defining CSS variables for light and dark themes plus base styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template loading the main React entry and preloading assets.
frontend/PRODUCTION_CONFIGURATION.md: Documentation describing required frontend and backend reCAPTCHA configuration and post‑deploy steps.
frontend/PRODUCTION_DEPLOYMENT_NOTES.md: Deployment notes file stub containing versioned production build information.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_PRODUCTION.md: Production smoke test checklist covering landing page, lazy‑loaded routes, contact form, reCAPTCHA, and phone field behavior.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack router with lazy‑loaded offer pages and renders the router.
frontend/src/components/landing/ContactF: Interactive contact form with validation, reCAPTCHA v3, and submission handling.
frontend/src/components/landing/ContactS: Contact section that loads reCAPTCHA when visible and displays contact info plus the form.
frontend/src/components/landing/Footer.t: Footer with branding, social links, and contact shortcuts.
frontend/src/components/landing/HeroSect: Hero section with title, tagline, background overlay, and primary CTAs.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingP: Landing page composing hero, offers, reviews, contact, and footer over a fixed background.
frontend/src/components/landing/OffersSe: Displays a grid of feature cards linking to offer pages with icons, emojis, and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/landing/ReviewCa: Renders a single review with star ratings, excerpt text, and reviewer name.
frontend/src/components/landing/ReviewsS: Shows a titled reviews section that lists curated reviews and includes a TripAdvisor call‑to‑action.
frontend/src/components/landing/TripAdvi: Provides a styled external link button directing users to the TripAdvisor review page.
frontend/src/components/offers/GetInTouc: Reusable CTA link that routes to the home page and scrolls to the contact section.
frontend/src/content/countryCallingCodes: Exports a list of country calling code options used for phone number selection.
frontend/src/content/curatedReviews.ts: Defines and exports an array of curated 5‑star reviews with reviewer info and excerpts.
frontend/src/content/offersPosts.ts: Contains structured content for offer detail pages, including metadata and sectioned text.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity auth, including login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageSeo.ts: Sets document title, meta tags, Open Graph, Twitter tags, canonical link, and optional JSON-LD article schema based on provided SEO config.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecaptchaV3.ts: Loads and initializes reCAPTCHA v3 on demand and exposes methods to execute actions and track readiness or errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollToHashSectio: Scrolls smoothly to the DOM element matching the current URL hash whenever it changes.
Submits contact form data through the backend actor and invalidates related queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, global theme variables for light/dark modes, typography, and custom utility classes for text effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/offers/ChooseYourOwnA: Renders the Choose Your Own Adventure offer page with SEO setup, post content sections, and a contact CTA.
frontend/src/pages/offers/FlexibleAsHell: Renders the Flexible As Hell offer page with SEO setup, structured content, and a contact CTA.
frontend/src/pages/offers/OffTheBeatenPa: Renders the Off The Beaten Path offer page with SEO metadata, post sections, and a contact CTA.
frontend/src/pages/offers/PrivateAndPers: Renders the Private and Personal offer page, pulling post data from offerPosts and applying SEO setup with styled article content and CTA.
frontend/src/pages/offers/StayYourWayPag: Displays the Stay Your Way offer page using offerPosts data with SEO configuration and structured article sections plus a CTA link.
frontend/src/pages/offers/StoriesAndBant: Provides the Stories and Banter offer page, loading content from offerPosts and rendering SEO metadata, article sections, and a CTA.
frontend/src/types/recaptcha.d.ts: Adds TypeScript declarations for the grecaptcha object on the window to support reCAPTCHA ready and execute methods.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from hashes for routing and state handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and extended theme values.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, listing existing features, pending requests, and requirements related to adding phone number support to the contact form.
